name: Easter Eggs Paint
description:
Easter is festival of holy week and its also Pascha. when we say easter bunny and marshmallow easter egg comes to our mind.

kids are invited in this game to get their eggs painted and decorated with this free Easter Eggs Paint 2016 game.

painting an easter egg is full of artistic mission it had never been so much fun and easy.

Choose the color of your egg from the egg basket then select the color you want to do on egg once that is done select the face pattern once that is done apply the sticker and ribbon and and put some gift on top of it also you can change the background.Painting your egg with your favorite colors, patterns and glitters is always awsome.

Decorate just the way you want your gift of easter egg to look.

Download this FREE easter game NOW and paint your vision on your egg before the easter ends.

HOW TO PLAY
=============

• Select your best egg from basket
• Boil the egg to make is harder
• Decorate your egg with your favorite color
• Apply beautiful decorative art on your egg
• Apply colorful patterns of glitter
• Apply stickers and expressions on your egg
• make it more presentable by adding present and ribbons
• And your easter egg is ready to be placed at your easter basket


Do let us know how Easter Eggs Paint 2016 did look after the décor and makeover of the easter festival. If you like our games please rate and review us as it valuable to us.we will keep on developing new kids games.


And enjoy our other free dressup, makeover, makeup games for girls & kids like nail, toes,3D simulator and hidden object games.
